resources.string: Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history

Emergency: Send your Location
 ----------------------------

 - Go to "Options" to select a contact person.
 - In case of an emergency, press the "Emergency: Send you Location". If your location setting and Data/Network are enabled, your location's coordinates, approximate address and the google maps URL of your location will be sent through SMS to the contact person you have selected.
 -To select an emergency contact, go to "Options" on the main screen. You must select somebody who is already saved in the phone's contact list.
 -If your Data/Network is disabled, only your location's coordinates will be sent.

 ----------------------------
 Medication Reminders:
 ----------------------------

 - "Add medication" allows you to store your medications name along with a picture of each medication you store in your reminder schedule.
 - "All medication list" gives you access to all the stored medications you have added and will show you the medications you have taken that day (green) and the ones you didn't take (red).
 - An alarm will go off to remind you to take your medication. The only way to confirm that you have taken your medication is to press on the "Dismiss Alarm". If you swipe the notification, the app will note that you didn't take the medication.

 ----------------------------
 Medication Record Organizer:
 ----------------------------

 - The "Medication Record Organizer" allows you to store the "Appointment Summaries", "Test Result" and "Miscellaneous" documents.

 ----------------------------
 Directions Home:
 ----------------------------

 - Go to "Options" to set your home address. - Location setting and Data/Network need to be enabled. - "Directions Home" will guide you back home by connecting you to google maps.
